column4: man.. intrepid ibex has been a _serious_ step backwards for nvidia drivers compatibility.. not only the native solution for proprietary drivers don't work, but it won't work with envy anymore.. *sigh*
what card does lspci say you have?
it's already installed.. but needs to be actived
sudo apt-get install nvidia-settings; gksudo nvidia-settings
is it listed in any menus after you type something. Possibly could also use tab followed by enter if one isn't listed
no it is not, and tab results in a indent space.. so am I right? gwibber is plain stupid?
not something i use. I use tweetdeck for chromium

but dude, it's the default client for ubuntu.. don't you agree it is stupid not to have a keyboard shortcut for seding messages? you have to actually click the button after you type, that is plain stupid
ctrl+enter like in ms outlook maybe..
tried it all.. just agree with me it is stupid
a shortcut would be a smart thing to have especially due to the nature of twitter (text)
but dont you agree it should be standard? as dr_willis suggested, i'm writing them an angrymail
i guess but i found what you needed with websearching which you could have also found.
